resources.string: Textile Dict was created with the aim to help textile majors look up English words in an easy and understandable way. The application has absolutely no ads, is not created for the purpose of making money. However, I still listen to your suggestions to make the application more and more perfect, and I promise to spend as much time as possible to perfect the application according to your suggestions that I can do. Any comments please leave a comment below the application or send a mail to devhw95@gmail.com.
Commenter: Le Thi Ai Linh - Sewing technology K61 - Hanoi University of Science and Technology.
A list of favorite words will appear here.
A list of recent words will appear here.
A list of newly added vocabulary will appear here. Click the + button to add vocabulary.
